text: good point koiava. the specular intensities converge, but when I'm brdf sampling, I disable the diffuse sampling since it's just a source of noise when multiple sampling. I'll fix in the future.

Intensities for both technique should match. They should converge to same result.
Nice demo BTW. I could not find time to port my shadertoy to multipass.
https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4sSXWt
It's a really nice looking demo, and it's quick to render.
Blown out on my MacBook Pro (AMD) under OS X 10.11 w/ Chrome
On Macbook Pro some people are seeing blown out results from the brdf importance sampling.  Other Mac's seem to be fine.  Let me know if you're seeing it.
